sentences.sContent: I had endless hours to knit and sew.
sentences.sCn: 我有无数的时间来缝缝织织。

sentences.sContent: I have already started knitting baby clothes.
sentences.sCn: 我已经开始织婴儿的衣服了。

words.tran: 针织；编织物；[外科] 骨愈合

trans.tranOther: If you knit something, especially an article of clothing, you make it from wool or a similar thread by using two knitting needles or a machine
to make clothing out of wool, using two knitting needles
